title: Charge Carrier Propagation Simulator
text:
2025 Spring: This app simulates charge carrier propagation through a semiconductor material over time and space. Final project for ECE 576 Advanced Device Physics.
App: https://pat-trinity-ralph-carrier-propagation-devicephysics-unm.streamlit.app/

title: Heme Binding Pockets
text:
MS Thesis (2021): Analyzing structural features of hemoprotein binding pockets to identify relevant features for heme cofactor binding.
Project site: https://engineer-pat.github.io/heme-binding/

title: Home
text:
LinkedIn  GitHub





Ph.D.Â student in Electrical Engineering at the University of New Mexico researching radiation-induced effects in wide bandgap optoelectronics. I work across III-V MOCVD growth, device design/fabrication, and electro-optical characterization, and when itâ€™s applicable, I use Python-based automation across these areas.
I like salsa/bachata dancing and long walks with my dog!

title: Home
text:
Highlights

Radiation-resistant wide bandgap optoelectronics (III-V/GaN): device design, fabrication, and electro-optical characterization
Automated MOCVD reactor telemetry: Python dashboard + Telegram alerts, reducing manual logging/analysis by ~90%
